verses.text: Concerning the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Hath \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* no \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*? hath he no \w heir|strong="H3423"\w*? why \add then\add* doth their \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w inherit|strong="H3423"\w* \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w*, and his \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in his \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*?\f + \fr 49.1 \ft Concerning: or, Against\f*\f + \fr 49.1 \ft their king: or, Melcom\f*

Therefore, behold, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that I will cause an \w alarm|strong="H8643"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* to be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w* of the \w Ammonites|strong="H1121"\w*; and it shall be a \w desolate|strong="H8077"\w* \w heap|strong="H8510"\w*, and her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* shall be \w burned|strong="H3341"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: then shall \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be \w heir|strong="H3423"\w* unto them that were his \w heirs|strong="H3423"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

\w Howl|strong="H3213"\w*, O \w Heshbon|strong="H2809"\w*, for \w Ai|strong="H5857"\w* is \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*: \w cry|strong="H6817"\w*, ye \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Rabbah|strong="H7237"\w*, \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* you with \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*; \w lament|strong="H5594"\w*, and run to and \w fro|strong="H7751"\w* by the \w hedges|strong="H1448"\w*; for their \w king|strong="H4428"\w* shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H1473"\w*, \add and\add* his \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.\f + \fr 49.3 \ft their king: or, Melcom\f*

Wherefore \w gloriest|strong="H1984"\w* thou in the \w valleys|strong="H6010"\w*, thy \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*, O \w backsliding|strong="H7728"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*? that \w trusted|strong="H0982"\w* in her \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w*, \add saying\add*, Who shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto me?\f + \fr 49.4 \ft thy…: or, thy valley floweth away\f*

Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* upon thee, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, from all those that be \w about|strong="H5439"\w* thee; and ye shall be driven \w out|strong="H5080"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* right \w forth|strong="H6440"\w*; and none shall gather \w up|strong="H6908"\w* him that \w wandereth|strong="H5074"\w*.

And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* I will bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ammon|strong="H5983"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Concerning \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; \add Is\add* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* no more in \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*? is \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* \w perished|strong="H0006"\w* from the \w prudent|strong="H0995"\w*? is their \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w vanished|strong="H5628"\w*?

\w Flee|strong="H5127"\w* ye, turn \w back|strong="H6437"\w*, \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w deep|strong="H6009"\w*, O \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Dedan|strong="H1719"\w*; for I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w* of \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* upon him, the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \add that\add* I will \w visit|strong="H6485"\w* him.\f + \fr 49.8 \ft turn…: or, they are turned back\f*

If \w grapegatherers|strong="H1219"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to thee, would they not \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* \add some\add* gleaning \w grapes|strong="H5955"\w*? if \w thieves|strong="H1590"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, they will \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* till they have \w enough|strong="H1767"\w*.\f + \fr 49.9 \ft till…: Heb. their sufficiency\f*

But I have made \w Esau|strong="H6215"\w* \w bare|strong="H2834"\w*, I have \w uncovered|strong="H1540"\w* his secret \w places|strong="H4565"\w*, and he shall not be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w hide|strong="H2247"\w* himself: his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* is \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*, and his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and his \w neighbours|strong="H7934"\w*, and he \add is\add* not.

\w Leave|strong="H5800"\w* thy fatherless \w children|strong="H3490"\w*, I will preserve \add them\add* \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*; and let thy \w widows|strong="H0490"\w* \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in me.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, they whose \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add was\add* not to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* of the \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* have \w assuredly|strong="H8354"\w* \w drunken|strong="H8354"\w*; and \add art\add* thou he \add that\add* shall \w altogether|strong="H5352"\w* go \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*? thou shalt not go \w unpunished|strong="H5352"\w*, but thou shalt \w surely|strong="H8354"\w* \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \add of it\add*.

For I have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by myself, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that \w Bozrah|strong="H1224"\w* shall become a \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w*, a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*, a \w waste|strong="H2721"\w*, and a \w curse|strong="H7045"\w*; and all the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* thereof shall be \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w wastes|strong="H2723"\w*.

I have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* a \w rumour|strong="H8052"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and an \w ambassador|strong="H6735"\w* is \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, \add saying\add*, Gather ye \w together|strong="H6908"\w*, and \w come|strong="H0935"\w* against her, and rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.
For, lo, I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w small|strong="H6996"\w* among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, \add and\add* \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* among \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

Thy \w terribleness|strong="H8606"\w* hath \w deceived|strong="H5377"\w* thee, \add and\add* the \w pride|strong="H2087"\w* of thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, O thou that \w dwellest|strong="H7931"\w* in the \w clefts|strong="H2288"\w* of the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w*, that \w holdest|strong="H8610"\w* the \w height|strong="H4791"\w* of the \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*: though thou shouldest make thy \w nest|strong="H7064"\w* as \w high|strong="H1361"\w* as the \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w*, I will bring thee \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from thence, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Also \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* shall be a \w desolation|strong="H8047"\w*: every one that \w goeth|strong="H5674"\w* by it shall be \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w*, and shall \w hiss|strong="H8319"\w* at all the \w plagues|strong="H4347"\w* thereof.

As in the \w overthrow|strong="H4114"\w* of \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* and \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w* and the \w neighbour|strong="H7934"\w* \add cities\add* thereof, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* there, neither shall a \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* in it.

Behold, he shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* like a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w* from the \w swelling|strong="H1347"\w* of \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* against the \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w* of the \w strong|strong="H0386"\w*: but I will \w suddenly|strong="H7280"\w* make him run \w away|strong="H7323"\w* from her: and who \add is\add* a \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \add man, that\add* I may \w appoint|strong="H6485"\w* over her? for who \add is\add* like me? and who will appoint me the \w time|strong="H3259"\w*? and who \add is\add* that \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w* that will \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me?\f + \fr 49.19 \ft appoint me…: or, convent me in judgment?\f*

Therefore \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that he hath \w taken|strong="H3289"\w* against \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w*; and his \w purposes|strong="H4284"\w*, that he hath \w purposed|strong="H2803"\w* against the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Teman|strong="H8487"\w*: Surely the \w least|strong="H6810"\w* of the \w flock|strong="H6629"\w* shall draw them \w out|strong="H5498"\w*: surely he shall make their \w habitations|strong="H5116"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8074"\w* with them.

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* is \w moved|strong="H7493"\w* at the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of their \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, at the \w cry|strong="H6818"\w* the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* thereof was \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.\f + \fr 49.21 \ft Red sea: Heb. Weedy sea\f*

Behold, he shall come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* and \w fly|strong="H1675"\w* as the \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w*, and \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* his \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* over \w Bozrah|strong="H1224"\w*: and at that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w* of \w Edom|strong="H0123"\w* be as the \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* of a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* in her \w pangs|strong="H6887"\w*.

¶ Concerning \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*. \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w* is \w confounded|strong="H0954"\w*, and \w Arpad|strong="H0774"\w*: for they have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w tidings|strong="H8052"\w*: they are \w fainthearted|strong="H4127"\w*; \add there is\add* \w sorrow|strong="H1674"\w* on the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*; it \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* be \w quiet|strong="H8252"\w*.\f + \fr 49.23 \ft fainthearted: Heb. melted\f*\f + \fr 49.23 \ft on…: or, as on the sea\f*

\w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w* is waxed \w feeble|strong="H7503"\w*, \add and\add* \w turneth|strong="H6437"\w* herself to \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*, and \w fear|strong="H7374"\w* hath \w seized|strong="H2388"\w* on \add her:\add* \w anguish|strong="H6869"\w* and \w sorrows|strong="H2256"\w* have \w taken|strong="H0270"\w* her, as a woman in \w travail|strong="H3205"\w*.
How is the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* not \w left|strong="H5800"\w*, the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* of my \w joy|strong="H4885"\w*!

Therefore her young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* in her \w streets|strong="H7339"\w*, and all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* shall be cut \w off|strong="H1826"\w* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.

And I will \w kindle|strong="H3341"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, and it shall \w consume|strong="H0398"\w* the \w palaces|strong="H0759"\w* of \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w*.

¶ Concerning \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w*, and concerning the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, which \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w* ye, go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Kedar|strong="H6938"\w*, and \w spoil|strong="H7703"\w* the \w men|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w east|strong="H6924"\w*.

Their \w tents|strong="H0168"\w* and their \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* shall they take \w away|strong="H3947"\w*: they shall \w take|strong="H5375"\w* to themselves their \w curtains|strong="H3407"\w*, and all their \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, and their \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*; and they shall \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* unto them, \w Fear|strong="H4032"\w* \add is\add* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*.

¶ \w Flee|strong="H5127"\w*, \w get|strong="H5110"\w* you far \w off|strong="H3966"\w*, \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w deep|strong="H6009"\w*, O ye \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; for \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* hath taken \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* against you, and hath \w conceived|strong="H2803"\w* a \w purpose|strong="H4284"\w* against you.\f + \fr 49.30 \ft get…: Heb. flit greatly\f*

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, get you \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto the \w wealthy|strong="H7961"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, that \w dwelleth|strong="H3427"\w* without \w care|strong="H0983"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which have neither \w gates|strong="H1817"\w* nor \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*, \add which\add* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w alone|strong="H0910"\w*.\f + \fr 49.31 \ft wealthy: or, that is at ease\f*

And their \w camels|strong="H1581"\w* shall be a \w booty|strong="H0957"\w*, and the \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w* of their \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* a \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*: and I will \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* into all \w winds|strong="H7307"\w* them \add that are\add* in the \w utmost|strong="H7112"\w* \w corners|strong="H6285"\w*; and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* their \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w* from all \w sides|strong="H5676"\w* thereof, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 49.32 \ft in…: Heb. cut off into corners, or, that have the corners of their hair polled\f*

And \w Hazor|strong="H2674"\w* shall be a \w dwelling|strong="H4583"\w* for \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w*, \add and\add* a \w desolation|strong="H8077"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: there shall no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* there, nor \add any\add* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* in it.

¶ The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* against \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w* in the \w beginning|strong="H7225"\w* of the \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* of \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*; Behold, I will \w break|strong="H7665"\w* the \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* of \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H7225"\w* of their \w might|strong="H1369"\w*.

And upon \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w* will I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w winds|strong="H7307"\w* from the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w quarters|strong="H7098"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and will \w scatter|strong="H2219"\w* them toward all those \w winds|strong="H7307"\w*; and there shall be no \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* whither the \w outcasts|strong="H5080"\w* of \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w* shall not \w come|strong="H0935"\w*.

For I will cause \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w* to be \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* their \w life|strong="H5315"\w*: and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* upon them, \add even\add* my \w fierce|strong="H2740"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and I will \w send|strong="H7971"\w* the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, till I have \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* them:

And I will \w set|strong="H7760"\w* my \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* in \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, and will \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* from thence the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ But it shall come to pass in the \w latter|strong="H0319"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \add that\add* I will bring \w again|strong="H7725"\w* the \w captivity|strong="H7622"\w* of \w Elam|strong="H5867"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
